DOC.brief_summary: This study compare cognitive-behavioral online self-management intervention design primary care treatment war-related PTSD control intervention , `` optimize usual primary care PTSD treatment '' . Patients PTSD train use online PTSD treatment website ask three time per week six week . They phone email access nurse train assist treatment program . Three schedule phone check-in six week treatment period provide ongoing contact patient treatment . The investigator assess PTSD symptom , depression , anxiety somatic symptom , physical health status occupational functioning three occasion : intervention , end treatment period , six week end treatment .
DOC.brief_title: DElivery Self Training Education Stressful Situations-Primary Care Version
DOC.detailed_description: The study multi-site trial evaluate efficacy DESTRESS-PC ( DElivery Self-TRaining Education Stressful Situations , primary care version ) , brief , web-based self-management intervention PTSD design delivery primary care . Participants randomize DESTRESS-PC log secure website self-CBT 3 time per week 6 week receive RN nurse care manager ( `` DESTRESS Nurse '' ) contact every two week . DESTRESS Nurses introduce approach , monitor , answer question , insure primary care provider collaboration . The control intervention optimize usual primary care . Blinded raters assess PTSD symptom , depression , anxiety , somatic symptom , physical health status , occupational function four timepoints . All study participant receive RN care management care primary care provider train evidence-based PTSD treatment receive status report DESTRESS nurse include baseline psychiatric status .
DOC.criteria: Referred primary care provider participate primary care clinic . Deployed either Operation Iraqi Freedom Enduring Freedom . Warrelated trauma deployed ( may include military sexual trauma ) . Current PTSD address CAPS interview . Reports routine access computer , internet , email . Successfully use Internet coordinate baseline assessment appointment . Provides research inform consent use local IRBapproved form . Plans continue care enrol primary care clinic least 4 month . Actively engage specialty mental health care previous two month . Failed specialty mental health treatment PTSD associate condition . Acute psychosis , psychotic episode , psychotic disorder diagnosis within past two year . Active substance dependence disorder past year . Active suicidal violent ideation within past two month . Currently antipsychotic moodstabilizing agent . Unstable administration schedule dose antidepressant , anxiolytic , sedativehypnotic ( i.e. , exclude relate medication change twomonths prior randomization ) . Acute unstable physical illness .
